author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: Request zone information for a specific zone in your organization.
commands.name: cylance-protect-get-zone

commands.description: Updates a zone in your organization.
commands.name: cylance-protect-update-zone

commands.description: Allows the caller to get a list of tenant policies.
commands.name: cylance-protect-get-policies

commands.description: Get a cylance InstaQuery search result.
commands.name: cylance-optics-get-instaquery-result

commands.description: Returns details for a single policy.
commands.name: cylance-protect-get-policy-details

commands.description: Get a list of all current InstaQueries.
commands.name: cylance-optics-list-instaquery

commands.description: Allows a caller to request a specific device resource belonging to a Tenant by hostname.
commands.name: cylance-protect-get-device-by-hostname

commands.description: Delete one or more devices from an organization.
commands.name: cylance-protect-delete-devices

commands.description: Requests threat details for a specific threat.
commands.name: cylance-protect-get-threat

commands.description: Allows a caller to request a page with a list of Console device resources that belongings to a tenant, sorted by registration (created) date in descending order (most recent device registered listed first).
commands.name: cylance-protect-get-devices

commands.description: Removes a convicted threat for a particular tenant from either the Global Quarantine list or the Global Safe list.
commands.name: cylance-protect-delete-hash-from-lists

commands.description: Allows a caller to request a page with a list of threats found on a specific device.
commands.name: cylance-protect-get-device-threats

commands.description: Produces a CSV threat data report of the indicators.
commands.name: cylance-protect-get-indicators-report

commands.description: Returns a list of global list resources for a tenant.
commands.name: cylance-protect-get-list

commands.description: Downloads the threat (file) attached to a specific SHA256 hash.
commands.name: cylance-protect-download-threat

commands.description: Allows a caller to request  a list of devices on a specific threat.
commands.name: cylance-protect-get-threat-devices

commands.description: Allows a caller to request a specific device resource belonging to a Tenant.
commands.name: cylance-protect-get-device

commands.description: Adds a convicted threat for a particular tenant to either the Global Quarantine list or the Global Safe list.
commands.name: cylance-protect-add-hash-to-list

commands.description: Create a cylance InstaQuery to search for artifacts in one or multiple zones.
commands.name: cylance-optics-create-instaquery

commands.description: Creates (adds) a zone to your Console.
commands.name: cylance-protect-create-zone

commands.description: Request zone information for your organization. This will return the top 100 records.
commands.name: cylance-protect-get-zones

commands.description: Returns information about Cylance Protect threats.
commands.name: cylance-protect-get-threats

commands.description: Updates the status of a convicted threat. Can be "Quarantine" or "Waive".
commands.name: cylance-protect-update-device-threats

commands.description: Allows a caller to update a specific Console device resource belonging to a Tenant.
commands.name: cylance-protect-update-device

playbook.description: This playbook returns a file sample to the War Room given the file's SHA256 hash, using Cylance Protect v2 integration.
playbook.name: Get File Sample By Hash - Cylance Protect v2

playbook.description: Deprecated. Use "Get File Sample By Hash - Cylance Protect v2" playbook instead.
playbook.name: Get File Sample By Hash - Cylance Protect

playbook.description: Enriches endpoints using the Cylance Protect v2 integration.
playbook.name: Endpoint Enrichment - Cylance Protect v2

playbook.description: This playbook accepts a SHA256 hash and adds the hash to the Global Quarantine list using the Cylance Protect v2 integration.
playbook.name: Block File - Cylance Protect v2

name: Cylance Protect
readme:
CylancePROTECT is an integrated threat prevention solution that combines the
power of artificial intelligence (AI) to block malware infections.
